title: [GAMEPLAY] DJ Sona Concussive Form Audio cutoff
body: The audio clips for the Concussive form of the DJ Sona skin appear bugged; whenever an audio clip plays it only plays a very brief portion of the clip, similar to when an audio clip is cancelled by another action. This has happened every time I've played the skin since at least 8.5, possibly longer. The other forms still play as intended, and rotating in/out of Concussive does not resolve the issue.

replies.body:
Hey Zansam. ^^ Judging by your icon, this mayyy be your favorite form? One of our sound designers is on the case and has a bug assigned to them. <3

**EDIT**: Should be fixed with 8.7! :)
